alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Johnson; Linn; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 9:05PM CST until December 15 at 9:15PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN LOUISA...SOUTHEASTERN BUCHANAN...JOHNSON... WASHINGTON...DELAWARE AND LINN COUNTIES... At 905 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sageville to Millersburg, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Iowa City, Washington, Manchester, Columbus Junction, Marion, Coralville, North Liberty, Hiawatha, Mount Vernon, Robins, Center Point, Kalona, Lisbon, Fairfax, Solon, Tiffin, Ely, Walford and Wellman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for southeastern, northeastern and east central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
